attributes.action: enforce the part of The Admissions Code relevant to school uniform to ensure that parents have a choice of supplier, cost and quality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the report by the OFT stating that uniforms are too expensive and should be widely available, The School Admissions code states that from September 2008 schools should ensure that uniform is widely available and not limited to one supplier, especially if that is the school shop. This part of The Admissions Code is not being enforced and should be. Schools are either not aware of it or are choosing to try to ignore it.
